articles.title: Gravitas: "Juice" mission to study Jupiter's icy moons - WION
articles.description: The European Space Agency will launch a mission to search for sustainable life on Jupiter's icy moons. Would the mission unravel the mysteries of deep space? Molly Gambhir brings you a report.

articles.author: Tereza Pultarova
articles.title: Europe's JUICE mission has to squeeze into a 1-second launch window. Here's why. - Space.com
articles.description: JUICE needs the universe to align so that it can get to Jupiter with as little fuel as possible.
articles.content: Europe's upcoming Jupiter mission has only one second a day in which it can  launch and hit the correct trajectory that will take it to the gas giant planet in eight years' time. Fortunately, the mis… [+3741 chars]

articles.title: On the trail of the painted lady butterfly - News - Nature Middle East - Nature Middle East
articles.description: Field research resolves long-standing question of where painted lady butterflies spend the European winter.
articles.content:
The painted lady butterflyRoger Vila
The painted lady butterfly (Vanessa cardui) is renowned for its long migration path, travelling thousands of kilometres between Europe and Africa. While the migr… [+3547 chars]
